message: How many of you are using pixelmator? Does it replace photoshop for your professional work?

not a mac guy but my brothers both are and they are stuck on aperture, I use CS5 and love it. While there is a big learning curve for those new to it, I can't see swapping over from CS5 and having to learn it all again. For my brothers its the same thing, they don't want to have to learn new tools. All of us have DSLR and 2 of us make money taking pictures..
Pixelmator has completely replaced Photoshop for me. I mostly use it for web graphics.
